short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read All Nepali Newspapers Online & Browse All Media of Nepal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U:
With this extension you can read All Nepali Newspapers Online and also browse all media links and websites of Nepal. Besides that you can listen to all live radio channels of Nepal. In this extension you will get all Nepali Newspapers, Nepali News Online Top 24 Nepal Newspapers & News Media such as Kathmandu Newspapers and online news in Nepal, The Himalayan Times - Nepal's No.1 English Daily The Himalayan Times Kathmandu News, The Kathmandu Post, Ekantipur epaper
etc.
long.en_GB: With this extension you can read All Nepali Newspapers Online and also browse all media links and websites of Nepal. Besides that you can listen to all live radio channels of Nepal.
